title: naTanam enbadu
sahitya:
naTanam enbadu uyartta oR anAdi kAla deivIka vinOdak-kalaiyAgum kaDavuLukkanda


anupallavi

  vaDa kayilai tanilum tiruppArk-kaDarkkarai tanilum anbODu
 vAnavarum mAmunivarum tannai marandu munnam purinda 


caraNam    ATTa dishaigaLilum ediroli muzhanga murasu bhEri mudalAya padineTTu
 vaghai vAdyam AlayangaLiladira maTTillAda kuzhal vINaiyin su-svara nAda sangItamoDu
arampayarum pADa manamum layam pera paravashamura Ananda nilai tarum
